description: There are more than 20 courses on Udemy about Making Money on Udemy. They claim a total of more than $3,000,000 in revenues over $150,000 in monthly revenues. We are talking a total of over 100 hours in lectures from nearly 20 successful Instructors at a total value of over $2,000. We have compressed ALL the Tricks and Secrets they teach in just a little over 30 minutes for the fraction of the price!!!
title: Teaching here: Making over $3 Million and $150,000 a month!
